column4: Hi there; I'm trying to get sound on a Gateway 3040GZ laptop. Any help ?
my experience has been if it's AC97 it just works
I'm right now going through the forums, trying to get the basics of this; what is AC97 ?
aaa .... about a year and half
intel 82801db ICH4 - I think that's the sign of the beast. / crank handle ? sorry, me newbie.
okay, ironically intel designed the AC'97 spec

I ran a couple of weeks ago, last time I had the patience to go through this (I really want to quit windows), into a forum post where a guy with a similar problem solved it by playing with the alsamixer - he just turned some switches on and off again; I turned all of mine on in alsamixer, just in case. Nada. Zip.
following a wifi and a widescreen 3-day-long troubleshooting session, this is really annoying.
can you recommend anyone with audio experience around here ?
